title: Phone Screener Abby Sings The National Anthem + Bobby Offers Raymundo A Deal on the Beanie Babies + Bobby’s Top 5 Torture Songs ‘On Repeat’
itunes:title: Phone Screener Abby Sings The National Anthem + Bobby Offers Raymundo A Deal on the Beanie Babies + Bobby’s Top 5 Torture Songs ‘On Repeat’
description:
Phone Screener Abby has been invited to sing the National Anthem in front of a crowd of almost 20k at the Nashville Marathon. Lunchbox doesn’t think she should do it…so today, she came in and auditioned. We give her a decision on if she’s ready or not! Bobby offers Raymundo a deal on the Beanie Babies to get back in on the cut. Bobby shares his top 5 songs that he would play on repeat the same way it went down in a news story.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
